simplesect.title: From Santa Fe Municipal Airport
simplesect.para: United and America West fly in to Santa Fe.

Leaving the airport, turn right towards the stoplight. Continue through the intersection on Airport road for several miles until you reach Cerrillos road (a large intersection). Turn left on to Cerrillos and drive until you reach the St. Francis intersection. Continue on until you reach Paseo de Peralta.

simplesect.title: From Albuquerque International Airport
simplesect.para: Take I25 north to the St. Francis exit. (It's about an hour.) Drive until you come to the large Cerrillos intersection and turn right. Continue on Cerrillos until you reach the hotel, which is at the intersection of Cerrillos and Paseo de Peralta.
